sentences.en: In the absence of 3 general situation to win, tuba naturally very happy.
sentences.cn: 在缺少三员大将的情况下能够获得胜利, 图巴自然非常高兴.

sentences.en: On the away with Shenhua, Tuba has to pay more to defense.
sentences.cn: 谈到客场与申花的比赛, 图拔已经表示要更加重视防守.

sentences.en: Strings, bassoon, tuba, timpani and gran causa ( bass drum ) march along with moody determination.
sentences.cn: 弦乐 、 低音管 、 大号 、 定音鼓和低音鼓犹豫着前进.

sentences.en: Tuba in the Magic City, the invitation will be accepted.
sentences.cn: 大号可以在魔龙城, 邀请就可以接受了.

words.tran_cn: 大号，低音兼次中音大号；（管风琴的）簧管音栓

trans.tran_en: a large metal musical instrument that consists of a curved tube with a wide opening that points straight up. It produces very low sounds when you blow into it.
